entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 30%
